messages.subject: WOW Guild
messages.msgSnippet: I was telling my hubby about the unschooling guild ( he is die hard  horde while i am die hard alliance) and he thinks it is just the neatest idea  ever and
messages.messageBody:
I was telling my hubby about the unschooling guild ( he is die hard horde
while i am die hard alliance) and he thinks it is just the neatest idea ever
and would love to be a part of it. I thought I saved the e-mail with the guild
name and Realm and all that but I guess I didn't, so could someone please
forward the e-mail with all that info on it to me? Thanks so much in advance.

~Alyssa in IL
_http://squishymommy.blogspot.com_ (http://squishymommy.blogspot.com/)


" Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."

"All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good people do
nothing."

" Knowledge is power but how you use that power defines wether you are good
or evil."






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
